description.value:
This stick of fast-burning incense creates a haze of smoke that keeps plant creatures from closing on the user.

Level: 4
Category: Alchemical Item
Time:
Component Cost: See Alchemical Item
Formula Cost: Null gp
Key Skill:

Power (Zone) âœ¦ Consumable (Standard Action)

Make an attack: Close burst 1; targets plants only; +10 vs. Fortitude; the burst creates a zone, and targets that are hit slide to the closest square outside the zone. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter, and plants that move into an affected square or begin their turn in an affected square are subject to the same attack from the greenbane.

Level 9: +15 vs. Fortitude.

Level 14: +20 vs. Fortitude.

Level 19: +25 vs. Fortitude.

Level 24: +30 vs. Fortitude.

Level 29: +35 vs. Fortitude.



Published in Dungeon Magazine 171, page(s) 36.
